metadata.Title: CVE-2019-7317 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
png_image_free in png.c in libpng 1.6.x before 1.6.37 has a use-after-free because png_image_free_function is called under png_safe_execute.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-7317` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

firefox - 67.0+build2-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
firefox-globalmenu - 67.0+build2-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
firefox-mozsymbols - 67.0+build2-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
firefox-testsuite - 67.0+build2-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

libpng-tools - 1.6.34-1ubuntu0.18.04.2
libpng16-16 - 1.6.34-1ubuntu0.18.04.2
No subscription required

openjdk-8-demo - 8u222-b10-1ubuntu1~18.04.1
openjdk-8-jdk - 8u222-b10-1ubuntu1~18.04.1
openjdk-8-jdk-headless - 8u222-b10-1ubuntu1~18.04.1
openjdk-8-jre - 8u222-b10-1ubuntu1~18.04.1
openjdk-8-jre-headless - 8u222-b10-1ubuntu1~18.04.1
openjdk-8-jre-zero - 8u222-b10-1ubuntu1~18.04.1
openjdk-8-source - 8u222-b10-1ubuntu1~18.04.1
No subscription required

openjdk-11-demo - 11.0.4+11-1ubuntu2~18.04.3
openjdk-11-jdk - 11.0.4+11-1ubuntu2~18.04.3
openjdk-11-jdk-headless - 11.0.4+11-1ubuntu2~18.04.3
openjdk-11-jre - 11.0.4+11-1ubuntu2~18.04.3
openjdk-11-jre-headless - 11.0.4+11-1ubuntu2~18.04.3
openjdk-11-jre-zero - 11.0.4+11-1ubuntu2~18.04.3
openjdk-11-source - 11.0.4+11-1ubuntu2~18.04.3
No subscription required

thunderbird - 1:60.7.0+build1-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
thunderbird-globalmenu - 1:60.7.0+build1-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
thunderbird-gnome-support - 1:60.7.0+build1-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
thunderbird-mozsymbols - 1:60.7.0+build1-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
xul-ext-calendar-timezones - 1:60.7.0+build1-0ubuntu0.18.04.1

criterions.comment: firefox package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '67.0+build2-0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
libpng1.6 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.6.34-1ubuntu0.18.04.2').
openjdk-8 package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8u222-b10-1ubuntu1~18.04.1').
openjdk-lts package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '11.0.4+11-1ubuntu2~18.04.3').
thunderbird package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:60.7.0+build1-0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
